item.description:
Please feel free to bring your favorite beverage.  I will of course have some munchies, but you may bring what you like.  We do a $10 buy in and do not allow re-buys because it is on a week night!  Plus I collect $1 from each member for Nina, the organizer of the goup.

We are an easy going group and play for fun. It is competitive but not serious.

Hope you see you this summer!

Darlene & Dave

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Poker Tournament at the Rubinos House
